attributes.action: Withdraw the bank licenses of banks that don't wish to trade as banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banking crisis is, apparently being caused by banks not wanting to lend. If they don't want to fulfill this primary role of lubricating the wheels of the economy then why should they have a banking licence. 
Or is it right they pursue their chosen path and increase the costs and rates they charge their customers ?
